name: Basketball-3D
description:
Hello there! This is Basketball-3D - a free indie 3D basketball simulator! You don't understand that much of basketball? Don't worry! This game is NOT ONLY for fun! It will also teach you a lot of theoretical and help you learn a lot of practical stuff about basketball, I mean you're probably gonna learn some game rules as well as get adapted not only to this game, but also to the Real Life Basketball!

Note that this game may receive updates at any time (like the eventual local multiplayer we're thinking of), so if you find anything that should or should not be in this game, just let us know!

When is the local multiplayer gonna come? Well, we're not entirely sure! Probably by the end of 2020! I dunno! We haven't even decided whether to start working on it yet! Your comments might be supportive for our decision! For now, you can at least learn playing this game and also have fun on your own with the AI!
